swen221.cardgame.cards.core

Interface CardGame

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCardGame, ClassicWhist, KnockOutWhist, SingleHandWhist

    public interface CardGame
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents a Whist-like card game.

        java.util.Set<Player.Direction> getWinnersOfGame()
        Return the winner(s) of this game. Note that there can be multiple winners in games where players form partnerships, or where there is a draw.

      • endHand

        void endHand()
        Signal that the current hand is over. This is a useful opportunity to update player scores, etc.

      • endRound

        void endRound()
        Signal that the current round is over. This is a useful opportunity to update player trick counts, etc.
